statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content:
Count the number of cyclic permutations of length n with no continuous subsequence [i, i + 1 mod n].
Output the answer modulo 998244353.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
The first line of the input contains an integer T , denoting the number of test cases.
In each test case, there is a single integer n in one line, denoting the length of cyclic permutations.
1 ≤ T ≤ 20, 1 ≤ n ≤ 100000

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case, output one line contains a single integer, denoting the answer modulo 998244353.
